TopicTitle: How to stop parachutes from clipping into eachther

Articles.Content:
The title says it all. ive seen some gameplay screenshots, that does it, is there a mod for this? or anything you can help with? its not a big deal but it kinda grows on me and gets on my nerves the more rockets i land.

side note: i ve found some older threads going arround this issiue, but i didnt see any direct replyes in the way i was hoping.

Thank you.
There's a mod. I'm fairly sure stupid_chris' RealChute mod does this in some form.

There's a mod. I'm fairly sure stupid_chris' RealChute mod does this in some form.

not exacly what i was looking for. the only part i seemed to be interested was that 3 chutes holding the tilted capsule. wish there was something more relavent.

Thanks though

There's a mod. I'm fairly sure stupid_chris' RealChute mod does this in some form.

No it doesn't.
Real chutes does not hold them apart, however, it includes a single tri-parachute that are all held apart and appear to be three separate chutes.
